text: Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Elden Ring and Apex Legends. The build quality of the OMEN by HP 15.6-inch Gaming Laptop w/ 144Hz Micro-Edge Display, Intel i7-8750H Hexa Core, GeForce GTX 1070 Max-Q 8GB GDDR5, 16GB 2666MHz RAM, 1TB HDD & 16GB Intel PCIe Optane Memory, Windows 10 Pro is solid, and the keyboard is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Apex Legends, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the OMEN by HP 15.6-inch Gaming Laptop w/ 144Hz Micro-Edge Display, Intel i7-8750H Hexa Core, GeForce GTX 1070 Max-Q 8GB GDDR5, 16GB 2666MHz RAM, 1TB HDD & 16GB Intel PCIe Optane Memory, Windows 10 Pro. The trackpad is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for content creation and gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1070 in the OMEN by HP 15.6-inch Gaming Laptop w/ 144Hz Micro-Edge Display, Intel i7-8750H Hexa Core, GeForce GTX 1070 Max-Q 8GB GDDR5, 16GB 2666MHz RAM, 1TB HDD & 16GB Intel PCIe Optane Memory, Windows 10 Pro is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Cyberpunk 2077 and Call of Duty: Warzone. The build quality of the OMEN by HP 15.6-inch Gaming Laptop w/ 144Hz Micro-Edge Display, Intel i7-8750H Hexa Core, GeForce GTX 1070 Max-Q 8GB GDDR5, 16GB 2666MHz RAM, 1TB HDD & 16GB Intel PCIe Optane Memory, Windows 10 Pro is solid, and the port selection is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1070 in the OMEN by HP 15.6-inch Gaming Laptop w/ 144Hz Micro-Edge Display, Intel i7-8750H Hexa Core, GeForce GTX 1070 Max-Q 8GB GDDR5, 16GB 2666MHz RAM, 1TB HDD & 16GB Intel PCIe Optane Memory, Windows 10 Pro is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.
